A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Back and forth on this. The special effects were great and the plot was there. But for the first time in Star Wars I was just...bored. Subverting expectations does not make a film original. If you are going to do it\, make it fantastic\, exciting\, mystical...all the things every Star Wars before (even the prequels and Force Awakens) was. At the end of the day\, what makes this movie \"cool?\" What was \"amazing?\" what was \"incredible?\" Unfortunately\, the answer is always \"nothing.\"
